mapper.select: SELECT /* selectSubjectList */ online_subject.online_subject_id, product.product_name as service_title, online_subject.subject_title, online_subject.use_ornot, online_subject.apply_start_date, online_subject.apply_end_date, online_subject.reg_id, DF14(online_subject.reg_date) as reg_date, online_subject.modify_id, DF14(online_subject.modify_date) as modify_date, online_subject.delete_ornot FROM online_subject LEFT JOIN product ON product.product_id = online_subject.product_id WHERE 1=1 and online_subject.use_ornot = 'Y' and online_subject.delete_ornot = 'N' and online_subject.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY online_subject.`order`

SELECT /* selectBookScheduleList */ schedule.online_subject_schedule_id, schedule.online_subject_id,
schedule.`month`, schedule.seq, schedule.active_ornot,
book.book_id, book.book_thumbnail_file_id,
COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_CN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_STRE_COURS, COMTNFILEDETAIL.STRE_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_EXTSN, COMTNFILEDETAIL.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, COMTNFILEDETAIL.FILE_SIZE, COMTNFILE.CREAT_DT, COMTNFILEDETAIL.DOWNLOAD_CNT FROM online_subject_schedule schedule INNER JOIN contents contents on schedule.contents_id = contents.contents_id INNER JOIN book book on contents.book_id = book.book_id LEFT JOIN COMTNFILE on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILE.ATCH_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL on book.book_thumbnail_file_id = COMTNFILEDETAIL.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND schedule.online_subject_id = #{onlineSubjectId} AND schedule.active_ornot = 'Y' AND schedule.delete_ornot = 'N'
AND schedule.month = #{month} ORDER BY schedule.`year`, schedule.`month`, schedule.seq

SELECT /* selectThisMonthBookList */ online_subject_schedule.online_subject_schedule_id, online_subject_schedule.online_subject_id, online_subject_schedule.`position`, online_subject_schedule.`month`, online_subject_schedule.seq,
book.book_id, book.book_title, book.book_thumbnail_file_id,
case when contents_history.end_date is not null then 'Y' else 'N' end as resultYn -- 조회된 도서 목록 중 완료된 학습 여부 FROM online_subject_schedule LEFT JOIN contents on online_subject_schedule.contents_id = contents.contents_id LEFT JOIN book on contents.book_id = book.book_id LEFT JOIN contents_history on online_subject_schedule.online_subject_schedule_id = contents_history.online_subject_schedule_id and contents_history.user_manage_id = #{userManageId} WHERE 1=1 AND online_subject_schedule.online_subject_id = #{onlineSubjectId} AND online_subject_schedule.`month` = #{month} AND online_subject_schedule.active_ornot = 'Y' AND online_subject_schedule.delete_ornot = 'N' GROUP BY online_subject_schedule.online_subject_schedule_id ORDER BY online_subject_schedule.seq asc
